==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=左军}}

===Etymology===
Starting in the [[w:Zhou Dynasty|Zhou Dynasty]], the emperor organized his army into three major wings: the ''army of the right'', the ''army of the center'' and the ''army of the left''.
